subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
The project outputs include: 
1. Forest policy/legal framework reviews to create enabling environment for implementation of REDD
2. Climate change response strategy, policy and legal framework
3. Capacity deveped for waste management as potental resources for developement of CDM projects 
4. Early warning system streghened
subproject.title: sus. uttilisation of env. asse

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Goal: To reduce the impacts of climate change on the development 

Outcome: Development  in sectors susceptible to climate change secured against impact of climate change  
Objective: To strengthen national coordination of all efforts intended to respond to the climate crisis and integrate climate change into national strategic planning
Main outputs:
i.	Climate change strategy 
ii.	Climate change Policy and legal framework  
iii.	Advocacy and communication strategy 
iv.	Adaptation and Reducing Emissions from Deforestation and Forest Degradation programmes
subproject.title: CC Facilitation Unit

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Comprehensive and effective system for production and delivery of early warning services, tailored to serve climate change adaptation formulated through the institutional strengthening and system development; capacity developed for integration of climate change adaptation in early warning services; climate change adaptation concerns disseminated through cross-sectoral sensitization and capacity building on the relevance of early warning for adaptation.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Early warning system
